Uploader.name: File uploader
Uploader.description: File upload component with drag and drop support

dropzone.name: Dropzone
dropzone.description: If true, the dropzone will show

children.name: Children
children.description: Content to display inside the uploader

onChange.name: On Change
onChange.description: Callback when files are successfully uploaded

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Callback when an error occurs during upload

disabled.name: Disabled
disabled.description: If true, the children are in disabled state

readOnly.name: Read Only
readOnly.description: If true, the children are in read-only state
